title: Spiced Oatmeal Cookies
directions: In a bowl, cream shortening and brown sugar. Add eggs and milk; mix well. Combine flour, oats, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; add to the creamed mixture. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 in. apart onto lightly greased baking sheets. Bake at 350Â° for 12-15 minutes or until done. Yield: 4 dozen.
